Our Crayola magnetic double-sided easel lets kids play with a chalk board on one side and a dry erase board that’s magnetic on the other. product.description: Create magical, mess-free art with the Color Wonder Magic Light Brush and Drawing Pad. The Mess-Free Color Wonder Paints only appear on the Color Wonder Paper--never on skin, furniture, or fabric. To paint, just dip the Color Wonder Magic Light Brush in one of the paint pots and apply it to the Color Wonder Paper. The brush bristles will light up to show which color you’ve chosen before you apply it to the page. Artists ages three and up will love painting with the magic of Color Wonder.

product.name: Sticker Design Studio Deluxe Kit

In addition to essentials like the foam sticker sheets, stencil sheets, and starter set paints, you will also receive red, black, blue, brown, yellow and white tempera paints. product.name: Fashion Superstar Deluxe Kit

Simply use the included fashion design book for kids to start creating your new designs, then share and compete with them on the free fashion designer app to become the ultimate designer. If you’re looking for the perfect holiday gift idea for girls, look no further. Fashion design toys are always in trend, and it’s rare to find one that pairs digital and non-digital activities so effortlessly.

product.name: 240 Count Watercolor Pencils Classpack, 12 Colors

product.name: Crayon Factory
product.keywords: Crayon Factory,Crayola,Toys
product.description:
Recycle old crayon bits into colorful reusable crayons with the Crayola Crayon Factory. Designed to work with most standard size Crayola crayons, this electric-powered accessory lets kids create custom toys with colors of their choice. Simply feed crayon bits into the factory and watch as they melt and transform into cool, colorful figurines. The kit comes with three molds and eight full-sized crayons, so kids can start recycling crayons right out of the box. And because the resultant figurines are made of crayon wax, kids can use them for either drawing or playing.

2016 AWARD WINNER! Play on Words, 2016 PAL Awards; Parents' Choice Awards, Fun Stuff Award; National Parenting Products Awards, 2016 NAPPA Award; Toy Insider, Top Holiday Toy; Tillywig, Top Fun Award; Scholastic Parent & Child, Gold Star Award; Mom's Choice Awards, Silver Award

product.name: Crayon Carver
product.keywords: Crayon Carver,Crayola,Toys
product.description:
Children get to make their mark on their own crayons with the Crayon Carver. The motorized engraving machine comes with 40 tiles, including all the letters of the alphabet and fourteen fun icons that kids can use to carve messages and designs onto their crayons. A special brush helps dust off leftover crayon shavings to reveal crisp engravings. The Crayon Carver requires four AA batteries and is designed for ages 6+.

2015 AWARD WINNER!

Parents' Choice, Fun Stuff Award; Play on Words, PAL Award; Tillywig, Top Fun Award; Mom's Choice, Gold Award; National Parenting Publications, NAPPA Silver Award.

product.name: Magic Scene Creator
product.keywords: Magic Scene Creator,Crayola,Hot Items
product.description:
Turn still pictures into fun animations with Magic Scene Creator. To use, simply place any of the 70 included Motion Cards on the tablet screen and watch the cartoon drawings come to life. You can also make your own drawings and animate them using the Motion Cards .The Magic Scene Creator comes with six Gel FX Markers so you can draw directly on the screen or enhance the Motion Cards with your own embelishments--create your own car with wheels that appear to spin or draw a cool bird with wings that appear to flap! When it's time for something new, simply wipe the screen and cards clean with a damp cloth. Great for ages three and up, this fun coloring gift set is a wonderful way to experience the magic of animation.


2017 AWARD WINNER!

This kit also comes with Scratch & Sniff stickers and blank sticker sheets that kids can design and color using their custom markers for a fun scribble and sniff experience.

﻿

Wreckzilla and Destructodon are determined to change the skyline of their favorite city! And with the help of some boulder-launching volcanoes, they'll bring the city down brick-by-brick. Use the play mat, Morphix and molds to set the scene then launch, chomp and stomp your way through the city! Collect and connect other Create2Destroy play sets for the ultimate smash-up adventure! The canvases also can be framed (with frames sold separately), so kids can display their art and share it with friends and family members.

product.name: Premier Tempera Paint, 32 oz Bottle- Choose Your Color
product.keywords: Premier Tempera Paint 32 oz Bottle- Choose Your Color,Crayola,Paint
product.description:
The Crayola Premier Tempera Paint is a premium tempera, bright, intense colors, and true hue position. A creamy consistency with the highest opacity and good viscosity. Featuring one coat coverage, providing excellent performance on a variety of surfaces including newspaper, cardboard, papier-mache. Will not chip, flake, "powder", or bleed through when dry. Assures consistent performance and control of paint techniques. Complete in a translucent, plastic squeeze bottle with air-tight flip-top lid. Offers the highest performance that art Educators demand for their aspiring artists.

Available in 12 different colors: Black, Blue, Brown, Green, Magenta, Orange, Peach, Red, Turquoise, Violet, White, and Yellow. Each of these brilliant, opaque colors flow easily, cover well, and dry to a velvety matte finish.

product.name: Artista II Washable Tempera Paint, 32 oz.-Choose Your Color
product.keywords: Artista II Washable Tempera Paint 32 oz.-Choose Your Color,Crayola,Paint
product.description:
The Crayola Artista II Washable Tempera Paint features good opacity and coverage and can be used on a variety of surfaces, including newspaper, cardboard, and papier mache. Washable from skin and most washable clothing, the Artista II Washable Tempera Paint has excellent adhesion and end result. Perfect for secondary color mixing for teaching color theory, assuring consistent performance. Complete with a translucent, plastic squeeze bottle with air-tight flip-top lid.

Available in 12 different colors: Black, Blue, Brown, Green, Magenta, Orange, Peach, Red, Turquoise, Violet, White, and Yellow.

product.name: Oil Pastels 16 ct.
product.keywords: Oil Pastels 16 ct.,Crayola,Crayons
product.description: Crayola Oil Pastels have rich color and creamy laydown. Colors are easy to blend. Pointed tips allow for detailed drawing. Hexagonal shape makes them easy to hold. 16 ct.

product.description: The Crayola Creative Escapes Travel Folio offers 30 pages of nature scenes, mandalas, geometric designs, and other soothing patterns from the artists of Crayola, all with detailed line art printed on heavyweight paper. product.name: Kid's First Large Washable Crayons 16 ct.

product.description: Kids love Crayola crayons and parents love the hours of creative fun they provide. This pack has 16 non-toxic, washable crayons in classic colors to keep budding artists entertained for hours.

product.name: Trolls Light Up Tracing Pad
product.keywords: Trolls Light Up Tracing Pad,Crayola,Toys
product.description: Enjoy fun, easy tracing with the Crayola Light Up Tracing Pad. With its bright LED-backlit screen and handy paper-locking frame, this tracing pad illuminates images and helps kids achieve precise, satisfying results every time they trace. The set comes with everything kids need to begin tracing including 12 vibrant colored pencils, 10 blank sheets of paper, and 10 adorable tracing sheets inspired by the Trolls feature film.

product.name: Art with Edge, Batman Collection
product.keywords: Art with Edge Batman Collection,Crayola,Adult Coloring

product.name: Collectible Pencil Tin

product.description:
Thirty short Crayola Colored Pencils, neatly packed in a collectible, decorative and sleek tin.

This durable container includes 30 Short Crayola Colored pencils. This colorful collection also includes neon and metallic colors. To keep your creative tools in tip-top shape, there is a handy sharpener inside, too! From Red to Metallic Blue, Hot Magenta, and White, you are sure to have the colorful collection you need to complete any project from Color Escapes works of art, to coloring books, art projects and so much more!

product.description: With the 62-page design book, 24 colored pencils, and 18 SuperTip Markers, young designers have all the colorful tools they need to create their own unique designs by hand with Crayola Fashion Superstar Designer. product.description:
The My First Crayola Mess-Free Sand Scribbler lets your little one create in the sand over and over again with no mess. The rounded stylus is ergonomically designed for small hands and has a magnetic tip, allowing young children to create drawings in the sand when they connect it to the magnet inside the Sand Scribbler. A tether connects the stylus to the Sand Scribbler to keep it from getting lost.

2016 Award Winner!

Play on Words, 2016 PAL Awards and Top Ten Toy Pick; National Parenting Product Awards, 2016 NAPPA Award; Toy Insider, Top Holiday Toy; Tillywig, Best Creative Fun Award; Marriah Media, Gold Award; Santa Choice, Santa Choice Award

product.name: Art with Edge, Justice League Collection

  Download finished pages & be inspired!

product.name: 72 count Silly Putty Bright Eggs Assorted Colors
product.keywords: 72 count Silly Putty Bright Eggs Assorted Colors,Crayola,Hidden
product.description: Product Description: Bounce it, snap it, squeeze it, there’s a seemingly infinite number of ways to stretch the imagination with Silly Putty, and now the possibilities for gifting are even greater with our 72ct set. There’s not an Easter basket, holiday stocking, or backpack that wouldn’t fit a Silly Putty egg, and it makes a great on-the-go activity. While fun, non candy Easter egg fillers can be hard to find, it’s even harder to repurpose plastic Easter eggs throughout the rest of the year. This bulk set of putty toys, solves both those needs on Easter. The fun never ends when kids discover Silly Putty inside the plastic eggs you’ve hidden for their egg hunt. In addition to Easter egg hunt supplies, they also make great stocking stuffers, birthday favors, and everyday gifting surprises!

product.name: 64 ct Broad Line Markers, Variety

Includes 48 Ultra-Clean Broad Line Markers, 8 Gel FX Markers, and 8 Window Markers.

product.name: Erasable Colored Pencils 24 ct.
product.keywords: Erasable Colored Pencils 24 ct.,Crayola,Colored Pencils
product.description: Great for use at home or school, Crayola Erasable Colored Pencils are an essential creative tool for kids. This pack of 24 pre-sharpened colored pencils with erasers let kids easily redo drawings or correct mistakes. Create brightly colored lines that are perfect for school projects and creating detailed artwork.

product.name: Washable No-Run School Glue, 4-oz.
product.keywords: Washable No-Run School Glue 4-oz.,Crayola,Paint & Create
product.description:
School glue is essential for everything from science projects to history presentations, and world-class works of art. It’s even essential for slime supplies! But not all kids’ glues are washable, clear, or nontoxic like Crayola Washable No-Run School Glue. Since our glue doesn't crack and chip away, kids can hold onto their creations for much longer. Plus, the convenient size of our 4 oz glue bottle is perfect for backpacks, while the special applicator tip prevents clogging, so it's always ready for use.

Want to use this Crayola glue for some gooey fun? Check out our slime recipes today!

product.name: Erasable Twistables Colored Pencils, 12 Count
product.keywords: Erasable Twistables Colored Pencils 12 Count,Crayola,Colored Pencils
product.description: Crayola Erasable Twistables Colored Pencils put a new spin on creativity—and the ability to erase mistakes! Just turn the ends to twist up 12 brilliant colors. There's no sharpening needed—just twist and you're ready to create! The specially formulated colors are made to rub off easily with a few swipes of the built-on erasers. Great for coloring, art projects and crafts!

product.name: Art with Edge, Geoscapes
product.keywords: Art with Edge Geoscapes,Crayola,Adult Coloring
product.description: Welcome to the world of creativity! Break out your Crayola Markers and start living on the edge! Perfect size for framing at 8 inches x 10 inches

product.name: Art with Edge, Naturescapes

product.description: Welcome to the world of creativity! Break out your Crayola Markers and start living on the edge! Perfect size for framing at 8 inches x 10 inches

product.name: Cling Creator
product.keywords: Cling Creator,Crayola,Toys
product.description:
The Cling Creator has all the tools kids need to unleash their creativity through designing and producing removable clings. Make up to 20 clings from the included molds or create your own mold designs using clay. Create single-color clings or experiment with color mixing and effects. The opportunities for creative expression are endless. For children ages eight and up.

2015 AWARD WINNER!

Good Housekeeping, Best Toy Award; Dr. Toy, 100 Best Children's Products; Tillywig, Best Creative Fun Award; Mom's Choice, Gold Award; National Parenting Publications, NAPPA Silver Award.

product.name: 4 ct Paint Brushes

product.description: Soft and absorbent, natural bristles hold more paint! Includes 4 brushes.

product.description: 8-Count Washable Dry-Erase Crayons, Neon includes 8 dry-erase crayons and an E-Z Erase Cloth. Features a Built-In-Sharpener. Simply remove stubborn marks with water!

product.description: See tip swirling around in the bottom of this acrylic 3 oz cup. Markers and crayons swirl around tip characters in rainbow fashion. Great for the bathroom sink for teeth brushing!

product.name: Quickflip 2-Sided Glow Easel
product.keywords: Quickflip 2-Sided Glow Easel,Crayola,Art Kits & Easels
product.description:
The Quickflip 2-Sided Glow Easel is a collapsible child's art easel with a board that rotates 360 degrees. Flip to one side for a glowing doodle surface or rotate to the other side for a traditional surface for chalk, painting or coloring. The light-up board can change between 10 light sequences with the press of a button. A storage tray fits beneath the board and comes with areas to store art supplies, including paint cups. The unit folds easily for simple storage. Suited for ages 4+.

The Quickflip Double Sided Easel comes with 2 gel markers, 2 paint cups, 2 paint brushes, and 1 Crayola eraser. The easel measures 20" W x 18.5"D x 42" H and weighs 9 lbs.

As our largest faux calligraphy set, this all-inclusive starter kit features a 16 page Creative Lettering Guide by Lisa Funk, 50 Super Tips Washable Markers, 5 Paint Bush Pens, and 8 Metallic Markers. Follow step-by-step instructions, then trace and practice your way to perfection. In no time you’ll be creating professional place cards and invitations, as well as beautiful decorations and hand written letters.

For more information and inspiration visit the #Crayoligraphy Page

Can you keep a secret? This is really a 5-in-1 DIY Slime Kit because with the included ingredients for Butter Slime, you can make 3 varieties, and with the included ingredients for Glitter Slime you can make 2 varieties. The featured ingredients are Washable No-Run School Glue, Bold Washable Glitter Glue, and Model Magic in Red, Blue, and Yellow.

product.name: Marbleized Slime Kit
product.keywords: Marbleized Slime Kit,Crayola,Exclusives
product.description: Have some fun by making DIY slime with the family! The Marbleized Slime Supplies Kit is just what kids need to create their custom version. The recipe for slime from our video can be made with the art supplies in this set, plus your own lotion, baking soda, and contact lens solution. Kids can color the homemade slime with any of the markers, giving their finished product a one-of-a-kind, colorful look.

product.name: Color Wonder Paw Patrol Bundle
product.keywords: Color Wonder Paw Patrol Bundle,Crayola,Color Wonder
product.description: Kids can celebrate their love for Paw Patrol characters with this Paw Patrol themed Color Wonder art kit. The included 10 Color Wonder mini markers and 6 Color Wonder paint pots allow for mess free coloring and painting since they only work on the Color Wonder paper! Let kids express themselves on any of the 18 Paw Patrol coloring pages or 30 blank coloring pages. Whether they’re jazzing up the dog drawings or making their own imaginative illustrations, parents can rest easy knowing this gift set for kids is full of mess free fun.

product.name: Ultimate Crayola Slime Kit with Bonus Bag
product.keywords: Ultimate Crayola Slime Kit with Bonus Bag,Crayola,Value Sets
product.description:
Ingredients for four different DIY Slime varieties are included in this set. Create Marbelized, Pastel, Butter and Sparkle Slime with this kit! Teach your kids to make homemade slime with the safe, nontoxic Crayola products. Featured in this set you will receive Washable No-Run School Glue, Bold Washable Glitter Glue, Broad Line Markers, 8 Washable Watercolors, and Model Magic in Red, Blue, and Yellow. Just add contact solution, lotion, and baking soda to create Marble, Pastel, Model Magic Butter, and Glitter Slime varieties. We have also included a bonus Neon Drawstring Bag, so that kids will have storage for their ingredients.

Our Cookie Cutter Ornament Crafts Kit gives you the Crayola supplies needed to make beautiful marbleized paint and imprinted clay ornaments.  To see how these simple DIY painted ornaments are made, you can watch our free online ornament videos. Featured in the set you will receive a bucket of Air Dry Clay, 24ct Watercolors, 9ct Glitter Glue, Scissors, and No Run School Glue. The rest of the supplies are common household items including a winter hat, cookie cutter, straw, string, wax paper, hole punch, cardboard and craft stick. Bring home a fun activity for the kids to craft this holiday and discover how to make clay and glue ornaments.

product.name: Uni-Creatures! Coloring Book

product.description: Give your kids a chance to dive into a world of rainbows, donuts, and sparkles, as they color in our all new unicorn coloring book, where no color is off limits. While most kids know all about unicorns, what about all the other uni-creatures out there? Within these unique coloring pages, mysterious creatures await imaginative young minds who can bravely bring color to their world. The included sparkle stickers are great for adding extra flare, whether inside the coloring pages, or on pencil cases, backpacks, and more. product.name: Imagination Express Imagineering Train Set by Lionel

Bounce it, snap it, squeeze it, there’s a seemingly infinite number of ways to stretch the imagination with Silly Putty, and now the possibilities for gifting are even greater with our 72ct set. There’s not an Easter basket, holiday stocking, or backpack that wouldn’t fit a Silly Putty egg, and it makes a great on-the-go activity. While fun, noncandy Easter egg fillers can be hard to find, it’s even harder to repurpose plastic Easter eggs throughout the rest of the year. This bulk set of putty toys, solves both those needs on Easter. The fun never ends when kids discover Silly Putty inside the plastic eggs you’ve hidden for their egg hunt. In addition to Easter egg hunt supplies, they also make great stocking stuffers, birthday favors, and everyday gifting surprises! Barbie® and CRAYOLA® are inspiring young designers with a fashion design toy that will tie their imaginations up with tie dye! The Barbie® CRAYOLA® Tie Dye Fashions design sets include all of the tools and supplies needed to create unique tie-dye clothing for Barbie® doll (sold separately). And with washable fashions and a mess-free process, it’s easy to recreate this tie dye craft over and over again for new looks! To get started, choose one of three included patterned fashions and place it on the colored dress form. Then color in a unique design using the three included CRAYOLA® markers, each a different color. When your work is complete, spray with water -- a spray bottle is also included -- and watch your design transform into a trendy tie-dye fashion. It’s so cool and so much fun! There are so many possibilities for creative looks and minds. Each pack includes three pieces of washable clothing (a skirt, a top and a dress) with unique colors and tie dye-inspired graphic patterns. Young designers will love being able to express their style and creativity with this Barbie® fashion kit for kids! Includes three washable fashions, three CRAYOLA® markers, one spray bottle and one dress form; doll not included. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.

Celebrating teachers since the box of crayons rolled off the line in 1903, we started with Alice Binney, teacher and wife of one of our founders, who coined the name Crayola by combining the French terms for "chalk" and "oily." As our work with teachers continues, we bring innovative products, creativity-infused lesson plans, coaching, and product and grant donations.

Who will you thank?

This Crayola Thank a Teacher 64 Ct Crayons is the perfect way to show your thanks and appreciation to a special teacher in your life! The Crayola Thank a Teacher 64 Ct Crayons includes the standard four sleeves found in our classic Crayola 64 ct box. Empty "To" and "From" spaces allow you to personalize this box for your very own favorite teacher!

product.name: Barbie® Crayola® Rainbow Design Fashion Set

product.description: Barbie® and CRAYOLA® help young designers uncover their creativity with fashion design kits that will brighten their day! This Barbie® CRAYOLA® fashion design toy includes all of the tools and supplies needed to create unique clothing with rainbow scratch art fashions for Barbie® doll (sold separately). It’s so easy and completely mess-free! Choose one of three fashions with color-change fabric and place it on the dress form. Then simply use the CRAYOLA® crayon shaped scratch art tool to draw a design on black fabric -- as you draw, the color transforms, revealing rainbow colors for a “scratched out” effect. Change your mind? Make a mistake? Want to try something different? Use the eraser end of the CRAYOLA® tool to return the fabric to black and start all over. Create one look, erase to black and try another! There are so many possibilities for creative looks and minds. Each pack includes three pieces of Barbie doll clothing with the color-change fabric: a skirt, a top and a dress, as well as a top with CRAYOLA® crayon-inspired print. Young designers will love being able to express their style and creativity in endless ways! Includes CRAYOLA® design tool, three color-change fashions, one top and one dress form; doll not included. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.

product.name: Barbie® Crayola® Color Magic Station™ Doll & Playset
product.keywords: Barbie® Crayola® Color Magic Station™ Doll & Playset,Crayola,Merchandise
product.description: Create unique, colorful doll fashions for Barbie® with the Barbie® Crayola® Color Magic Station™ doll and playset. Designing is easy with the included fashion design tools for kids, and washable paints make it a great kids painting set, too! Choose one of the three included Barbie fashions -- each trendy dress is washable to allow for endless possibilities in fashion design for kids. Place a fashion on the dress form and place the dress form in the Color Magic Station™. Then choose stencils, and place them on the fashion. Each set comes with one full-length stencil, two half-length stencils and five smaller icons, like a butterfly, heart and palm tree. Next, pick a Crayola® washable paint color (pink, yellow and blue are included), add it to the paint compartment and close the lid. Turn the handle while pushing it forward to create a colorful, mess-free, paint-splash effect. Try mixing and matching multiple stencils and colors. You decide because you’re the designer! When done designing, remove the stencils with the tweezers and reveal your finished look. It’s so cool! Dress Barbie® doll in the finished fashion and accessorize with the included shoes and necklace. Wash the looks out to create a fresh canvas and design again and again! Young designers will love seeing their artistic ideas become wearable fashions for Barbie® doll! Includes Barbie® doll wearing washable fashion and accessories, two additional washable fashions, the Color Magic Station™, one full-length stencil, two half-length stencils, five smaller stencils, three Crayola® washable paint colors, and tweezers. Each sold separately, subject to availability. Dolls cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

product.name: Crayon Melter
product.keywords: Crayon Melter,Crayola,Toys
product.description: Run for the shelves and grab your old box of crayons, because there's a new way to color your world with Crayola crayons! Our Crayon Melter brings renewed life to Crayola crayon sets everywhere with melted crayon artwork that's easier than ever before to create. Now you can make Crayon drip art without a hair dryer. This fun crafting tool is a great way to add detail to your drawings, texture to your sculptures, or doodles to your pencil jar. It has a low-heat tip and dries cool, so it's safe for kids 8 & up to enjoy. Simply use the included wrapper-ripper to remove labels from crayons and insert a crayon into the heated melter unit to get started. If you plan to change colors and wish to avoid color mixing, wait for the Crayon Melter to cool down and clean it between colors. For an even flow, make sure to give crayons the proper time to melt, and use small pieces of broken crayon to switch over colors faster. In addition to the 8 crayons included with this starter set, Pick Your Pack Complementary Colors are sold separately, and you can always use your crayon boxes from home. A great gift idea for holidays and birthdays, this colorful tool is fun for a variety of arts and crafts, school projects, and everyday creative activities.

Perfect for taking notes, art projects and organizing documents by color. Includes 6 washable gel pens in 6 vibrant colors. For 6 years and up.

Crayola® Picture Projector let’s kids create their own original art, right on the reusable screen then project their creations on the wall, ceiling – anywhere they want! The Picture Projector is great for sleepovers, camping trips or bedtime stories! It comes with 3 brightly colored wet-erase markers that wipe clean from the drawing surface with a damp cloth again and again! The Picture Projector also has built-in marker storages so you’re always ready to go! Requires 3 AA batteries, not included

product.name: Multicultural Large Crayons, 8 Ct.
product.keywords: Multicultural Large Crayons 8 Ct.,Crayola,Crayons
product.description: Bring more diversity to art projects with skin color crayons. You’ll find 8 different colors that represent skin tones from around the globe, including apricot, black, burnt sienna, mahogany, peach, sepia, tan, and white. And because it’s a great big world out there, kids can use these multicultural crayons to create more inclusive drawings.

product.name: #SquadGoals Coloring Book
product.keywords: #SquadGoals Coloring Book,Crayola,Coloring Books & Paper

Explore the fun activities and adventures that friends of all shapes and sizes can do together in the Crayola Squad Goals Coloring Book. There are 96 pages of trendy line art depicting friends accomplishing their squad goals. Also includes a sticker sheet. Great for kids ages 3 and up!

product.name: Bunny Lap Travel Desk
product.keywords: Bunny Lap Travel Desk,Crayola,Art Kits and Easels
product.description: Crayola Kids' Travel Lap Desks allow kids to color and draw on the go all with an adorable travel buddy along for the ride. Also features a pouch to hold the included 6 Pip-Squeaks Skinnies Markers and additional art tools. The bunny detaches easily from the desk to make machine washing a snap!

product.name: Crayon Melter Deluxe Kit
product.keywords: Crayon Melter Deluxe Kit,Crayola,Toys and Activities
product.description: It’s time to make metallic and neon crayon melting art! Kids can use the included Crayon Melter, metallic crayons, and neon crayons to dream up dazzling designs on the 2 paint canvases. The shimmery special effects and bright neon colored crayons add a new dimension to wax painting artwork and bring fresh fun to crayon crafts. This craft set is a great gift for kids, giving them everything they need for a colorful day of play.

product.name: Sticker Art Set for use with Crayon Melter

Discover a whole new way to create with your Crayola® crayons! Includes 2 8”x10” silhouette sticker sheets, 3 sheets of cardstock, 8 crayons, and instructions. For 8 years and up.

product.name: Sloths Love Llamas Coloring Book
product.keywords: Sloths Love Llamas Coloring Book,Crayola,Coloring Books & Paper
product.description: Who knew sloths and llamas were such good pals? Nobody, but it is fun to imagine this unlikely animal odd-couple in all manner of amazing adventures! The Crayola Sloths Love Llamas Coloring Book includes 96 pages of quirky line art depicting all kinds of slothful escapades and llama drama. Even includes a sticker sheet! Great for kids ages 3 and up!

product.name: Multi-Colored Children's Chalk 12 ct.

product.description:
Brilliant colors for use on paper and surfaces other than chalkboards.

product.name: Model Magic Gooey Fun! Party Set!
product.keywords: Model Magic Gooey Fun! Party Set!,Crayola,Art Kits and Easels
product.description: Throw a party with the Model Magic Gooey Fun! Slime Kit for girls and boys! Kids can create 10 different types of slime with the featured slime supplies and the handy Project Idea Instruction Booklet. The 8 Packs of Model Magic, Washable No-Run School Glue, 10 Glitter Glue Tubes, Slime “Part B” Solution, and Pipette are just what they need to get the stretchy fun started. Plus, the 3 Resealable Slime Containers help protect and prevent dry out of the finished goo product, allowing for more play on another day. Whether it’s for a birthday party or special celebration, kids will have a blast making 10 kinds of DIY slime with this all-in-one set.

product.name: Washable Crayons 8 ct.

product.name: 200 Count Crayola Fine Line Markers Classpack, 10 Colors
product.keywords: 200 Count Crayola Fine Line Markers Classpack 10 Colors,Crayola,Classpacks & Bulk
product.description: Crayola Classic Fine Line Markers are the classic, long-lasting, durable markers you know from your childhood. They lay down lots of brilliant color, yet don't bleed through most paper. Put students' imaginations to work with these classic, long-lasting, durable markers which lay down lots of brilliant color, this bulk Fine Line Marker Classpack includes enough supplies for the entire class! A total of 200 markers are included. There are 20 markers in each of the following 10 colors: Brown, Yellow, Orange, Red, Violet, Blue, Green, Black, Flamingo Pink, and Dolphin Gray.

product.name: Model Magic Gooey Fun! DIY Slime Edition
product.keywords: Model Magic Gooey Fun! DIY Slime Edition,Crayola,Art Kits and Easels
product.description: Let cool goo creations commence with the Model Magic Gooey Fun! DIY Slime Kit for girls and boys—exclusive to Crayola.com! Kids can create 4 different types of slime at home with the featured slime supplies and Instruction Booklet, plus their own lotion, baking soda, and contact lens solution. The set has 4 Washable No-Run School Glues, 10 Markers, 8 Washable Watercolor Paints , 1 Paintbrush, 1 Storage Tub of Model Magic, and 1 Washable Glitter Glue. These goo ingredients are housed in a convenient carrying case, which makes it easy to whip up Sparkle, Butter, Marbleized, and Pastel Slime wherever and whenever.

product.name: Scribble Scrubbie Color & Wash Collectible Toy Pets, Expansion Bundle
product.keywords: Scribble Scrubbie Color & Wash Collectible Toy Pets Expansion Bundle,Crayola,Toys and Activities

These fun pets have a soft coat that’s almost as fun to pet as it is to decorate! Watch as your child’s imagination shines through in every colorful design they add to the coats of these adorable collectible figures. This bundle includes 8 of the 12 Scribble Scrubbie Pets in the collection. It’s a fun and creative toy for kids, that can be recolored over and over again. Whenever your kids are ready to restart their pet’s look, they can simply clean off the washable marker using the included Scrub Brushes. It’s a new take on pet grooming toys for kids, and would make the perfect holiday or birthday gift for girls or boys, age 3 & up.

product.name: Trolls Color 'n Sticker Book
product.keywords: Trolls Color 'n Sticker Book,Crayola,Coloring Books & Paper
product.description: Spend coloring time with favorite characters like Poppy, Biggie and many more from the Dreamwork’s movie, Trolls . With 32 pages of character line art and over 50 stickers for hours of coloring and sticker fun.

product.name: Scribble Scrubbie Color & Wash Collectible Toy Pets, All-in-One Set
product.keywords: Scribble Scrubbie Color & Wash Collectible Toy Pets All-in-One Set,Crayola,Toys and Activities
product.description: Color, Rinse, Re-Pet! Crayola Scribble Scrubbie Pets are adorable, colorable and washable collectible toys for kids, that little would-be groomers can customize again and again! They have soft coats that are fun to pet and that easily wash clean with water and a little scrub. Our All-in-One Scribble Scrubbie set includes all 12 playful pets from our core and expansion packs, as well as 5 Scrub Brushes, 1 Scrub Tub, and 18 Washable Markers. Create fun patterns for their colorful coats, then when you’re ready for something new, pop ‘em in the Scrub Tub to get cleaned up. Create new vibrant coats for these playful doodle toys as often as you like! Birthday parties are more fun with this delightful coloring activity, and it makes a great holiday toy for kids, ages 3 & up.

product.name: Color & Sticker Book, Nella the Knight

product.name: Baby Milestone Coloring Set
product.keywords: Baby Milestone Coloring Set,Crayola,Coloring Books & Paper

The 6 thick coloring sheets contain line art for each of the 12 months—just color using the 24 colored pencils, cut out the finished product, and snap a picture with your latest creation and the newest member of the family. Great as a gift for expecting parents who love adult coloring, this coloring kit brings uniqueness and creativity to 1 month baby pictures and all the way up to 12 month baby milestone photos.

product.name: Scribble Scrubbie Pets-Cat/Dog

product.name: Bold Washable Glitter Glue 25ct.

product.name: Scribble Scrubbie Pets-Cats
product.keywords: Scribble Scrubbie Pets-Cats,Crayola,Scribble Scrubbie Pets
product.description: Color, Rinse, Re-Pet! Crayola® Scribble Scrubbie™ Pets are adorable, colorable and washable pet figures that little would-be groomers can customize again and again! Additional expansion 2-packs sold separately for a total of 12 adorable pet toys for kids. Collect them all!

product.name: Colored Pencils, Long 12 ct.
product.keywords: Colored Pencils Long 12 ct.,Crayola,Colored Pencils
product.description: Great for use at home or school, Crayola Colored Pencils are an essential creative tool for kids. This pack of 12 pre-sharpened colored pencils contains a range of vivid colors to inspire children's self-expression and imagination. Made with thick, soft leads that won't break easily, the pencils create brightly colored lines that are perfect for school projects and creating detailed artwork.

product.name: Art with Edge Vanishing Numbers Inspiration Art Case
product.keywords: Art with Edge Vanishing Numbers Inspiration Art Case,Crayola,Art Kits & Easels
product.description: Crayola® Art With Edge® is a line of wild, wacky, or whimsical coloring page designs just begging for your creative skills to bring them to life! The Art With Edge® Vanishing Numbers Inspiration Art Case contains 18 pages of pixelated hidden animal art. Hidden creatures are slowly revealed as you fill in the numbered pixels on the paper—and watch as the numbers and grid lines disappear, leaving an awesome “clean” image behind! Along with the pixelated art pages there are 12 Vanishing Numbers Markers contained in this portable and durable portfolio case. Pick up Art With Edge® today and start coloring on the edge!

product.name: Light Up Tracing Pad-Blue
product.keywords: Light Up Tracing Pad-Blue,Crayola,Toys
product.description: The Light-Up Tracing Pad lets kids trace and color detailed scenes. The ultra-thin tablet design and bright LED drawing surface make tracing easy. Start tracing right away with the content inside, then download 100s of images online. Paper-locking frame holds sheet inplace to keep crisp tracing lines.

product.name: Crayola Modeling Clay
product.keywords: Crayola Modeling Clay,Crayola,Clay
product.description:
Shape and Sculpt Again and Again

Young modelers have everything they need to mold soft sculptures with Crayola Modeling Clay Basic Colors. This versatile, non-hardening clay is completely reusable: it stays soft even after molding, ensuring it can keep up with your child's imagination. The clay also resists water thanks to its wax and oil-based formula, further lengthening its lifespan. Minimum Order Quantity of 2

product.name: Inspiration Art Desk
product.keywords: Inspiration Art Desk,Crayola,Art Kits & Easels
product.description: The Inspiration Art Desk by Crayola® provides a huge assortment of art supplies in a portable storage case that also functions as an art desk! From markers and crayons to paints and a brush, you get a variety of ways to draw, doodle and create colorful masterpieces. Pick your art tools, close the case and use the angled desktop to create art—it’s your own portable art studio. Includes 30 broad line markers, 48 crayons, 18 paint pots, 1 paintbrush, 20 line art sheets, 20 blank sheets and art desk with storage. For 4 years and up.
